alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery and Stewart Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Rock, or 8 miles northeast of Dover, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Clarksville, Big Rock, Cumberland City, Indian Mound and Woodlawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
